agents.flight.FlightArrivalInformationProvider¶

class agents.flight.FlightArrivalInformationProvider(agent, FAC=0)¶

Bases: Role

FAIP: Flight Arrival Information Provider

Description: Provides information needed to consider the arrival sequencing. It can provide a ‘generalise’ cost given a list of potential landing slots. It can also return directly the expected landing time.

__init__(agent, FAC=0)¶

On initialisation of a Role, it gets a pointer to the Agent it belongs to.

Methods

__init__(agent[, FAC])

On initialisation of a Role, it gets a pointer to the Agent it belongs to.

check_fai_request(fai_request_event)

The role will be waiting for this request to be triggered.

Reply to the EAMAN with the FAI of the flight

Return to the EAMAN the expected landing time for the flight

Request of what are the estimated landing times fo the flight.
check_fai_request(fai_request_event)¶

The role will be waiting for this request to be triggered. This is triggered once the wait_for_flight_arrival_information_request arrives

compute_cost_slots(elt, slots_times)¶

Default generalised ‘cost’ function for a given set of slots. The role will return the expected landing delay as a function of the slot. Note that in other implementations (with Modules) this can be changed to return instead the arrival delay, or the total expected delay, e.g. considering reactionary delay.

provide_flight_arrival_information(fai, eaman_uid)¶

Reply to the EAMAN with the FAI of the flight

provide_flight_estimated_landing_time(elt, eaman_uid)¶

Return to the EAMAN the expected landing time for the flight

send(msg)¶

Function to send messages to its own agent

wait_for_flight_arrival_information_request(msg)¶

Entry point into the Role. Wait for a request for flight arrival information. The message will have the information on the slots times for which information is requested

wait_for_flight_estimated_landing_time_request(msg)¶

Request of what are the estimated landing times fo the flight. 2nd way of accessing information on landing for the flight

Mercury
